question: Which among the following gives a precise definition of” Arbitrage” in Financial World?
option1: To profit from an existing discrepancy among prices, exchange rates, and/or interest rates on Different Markets without risk of these changing
option2: To profit from an existing discrepancy among prices, exchange rates, and/or interest rates on Same market without risk of these changing
option3: To profit from an existing discrepancy among prices, exchange rates, and/or interest rates on new techniques or products in same market.
answer: To profit from an existing discrepancy among prices, exchange rates, and/or interest rates on Different Markets without risk of these changing
